department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的是讓學生瞭解研究進行的完整過程，藉由研究問題分析、研究計畫規劃、資料蒐集管道與工具介紹、研究方法分析、研究成果案例分析等課題，讓學生瞭解如何規劃及進行日後的研究。此外，本課程亦將介紹一些研究方與工具，研究倫理基本觀念與簡報技巧，以利學生能夠具備日後進行研究的全方位基本知識。
goal.en: "The objective of the course is to introduce the whole processes of a research, especially for degree thesis. Based on the introduction of study problem analysis, study plan development, tools and approaches on literature review, research methodology, formats and examples for conference paper, journal paper and degree thesis, students can improve their capability of implementing learned knowledge/tools in completing degree thesis. Furthermore, the course will introduce some common research methods, the basic concept of research ethics and presentation skills to help students to have the thorough ability to complete their thesis in the future."

outline.ch:
"1.課程介紹 (Course introduction)
2.研究方法簡介 (Introduction to research methodology)
3.研究問題分析 (Study problem analysis)
4.研究計畫規劃 (Study plan development)
5.資料蒐集管道與工具介紹 (Tools and approaches on literature review)
6.研究方法論分析 (Analysis of research methodology)
(1) Case Study Methodology
(2) Questionnaire Design
(3) Basic Statistics (SPSS)
(4) Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP)
(5) SWOT
7.學術倫理介紹 (Introduction to research ethics)
8.研究成果呈現與報告 (Presentation of tentative research outcomes)
9.期末專題報告與討論 (Term project presentation and discussion)"
